Name: EventStatus
Title: EventStatus
Descriptino: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of an event.

Name: MedicationStatementAdherenceCodes
Title: MedicationStatement Adherence Codes
Descriptino: MedicationStatement Adherence Codes

Name: AdmissionSourceValueSet
Title: Admission Sources ValueSet
Descriptino: Defines the modes of transport or pathways by which the patient arrived.

Name: AfibFlutterStatusVS
Title: Atrial Fibrillation or Flutter Status ValueSet
Descriptino: ValueSet for the status of Atrial Fibrillation or Flutter assessment.

Name: AssessmentContextVS
Title: Assessment Context ValueSet
Descriptino: ValueSet for assessment context codes (e.g., timing of functional scores).

Name: BrainImagingModalityVS
Title: Brain Imaging Modality ValueSet
Descriptino: Defines the SNOMED CT codes for individual brain imaging modalities performed as procedures.

Name: CarotidImagingModalityVS
Title: Carotid Arteries Imaging Modality ValueSet
Descriptino: Defines codes for different types of carotid artery imaging.

Name: DischargeDeptVS
Title: Discharge Department/Service ValueSet
Descriptino: ValueSet specifying the type of department or service the patient was discharged or transferred to.

Name: DischargeDestinationValueSet
Title: Discharge Destination ValueSet
Descriptino: Defines possible patient discharge destinations.

Name: DischargeMedicationVS
Title: Medications ValueSet
Descriptino: Codes for drug products or substances representing the Medications on the patient discharge.

Name: FunctionalScoreCodesVS
Title: Stroke Functional Score Codes ValueSet
Descriptino: Codes for key functional scores used in stroke (mRS, NIHSS).

Name: HemorrhagicStrokeBleedingReasonVS
Title: Hemorrhagic Stroke Bleeding Reason ValueSet
Descriptino: Specifies the identified cause of a hemorrhagic stroke, typically used with an extension.

Name: InitialCareIntensityVS
Title: Initial Care Intensity ValueSet
Descriptino: ValueSet indicating the level of care provided initially.

Name: MedicationStatementMedsCodes
Title: MedicationStatement Therapy/Finding Codes
Descriptino: ValueSet containing SNOMED CT codes representing various medication-related procedures and findings (e.g., therapies, administration procedures, findings about use).

Name: MRsScoreVS
Title: modified Rankin Scale (mRS) Score ValueSet
Descriptino: ValueSet containing the codes for the modified Rankin Scale (mRS) score.

Name: MTICICodeVS
Title: mTICI Score Codes ValueSet
Descriptino: ValueSet containing the codes to represent the mTICI score used to assess the degree of reperfusion after a thrombectomy procedure.

Name: MTICIScoreValueSet
Title: MTICI Score ValueSet
Descriptino: ValueSet containing the codes to represent the MTICI score used to assess the degree of reperfusion after a thrombectomy procedure.

Name: PerforationProceduresValueset
Title: Perforation Procedures ValueSet
Descriptino: ValueSet containing SNOMED CT codes representing a range of perforation procedures.

Name: ProcedureTimingContextVS
Title: Procedure Timing Context ValueSet
Descriptino: ValueSet for codes defining the timing phase of a procedure relative to the encounter start.

Name: SpecificFindingCodesVS
Title: Specific Stroke Finding Codes ValueSet
Descriptino: Codes for specific clinical findings relevant to stroke (Afib/Flutter status, MTICI score).

Name: StrokeArrivalModeVS
Title: Stroke Arrival Mode ValueSet
Descriptino: ValueSet specifying the mode and origin of the patient's arrival.

Name: StrokeCircumstanceCodesVS
Title: Stroke Circumstance Codes ValueSet
Descriptino: Codes for findings related to the circumstances of stroke onset (In-hospital, Wake-up).

Name: StrokeDiagnosisVS
Title: Stroke Diagnosis ValueSet
Descriptino: SNOMED CT concepts representing final stroke-related diagnoses intended for use in Condition.code (and similar elements) within this IG. The scope covers ischemic stroke, intracerebral hemorrhage, subarachnoid hemorrhage, cerebral venous thrombosis, and transient ischemic attack (TIA). This value set is designed to support consistent capture, validation, analytics, and decision support. Implementers should expand against a terminology server using the appropriate SNOMED CT edition/version and preferred language(s) for display. Localizations or national derivatives MAY provide additional designations without altering the canonical definition. This value set is not intended for history-of, screening, or procedural concepts.

Name: StrokeDischargeDestinationVS
Title: Stroke Discharge Destination ValueSet
Descriptino: Defines the possible destinations of the patient upon discharge from the encounter.

Name: StrokeEtiologyVS
Title: Stroke Etiology ValueSet
Descriptino: Specifies the determined etiology of an stroke.

Name: StrokeFindingCodesVS
Title: Specific Stroke Finding Codes ValueSet
Descriptino: ValueSet for specific coded findings like Afib/Flutter status or mTICI score.

Name: StrokeProcNotDoneReasonVS
Title: Stroke Procedure Not Done Reason ValueSet
Descriptino: ValueSet containing specific codes to indicate why thrombolysis or thrombectomy was not performed.

Name: StrokeRiskFactorSNOMEDVS
Title: Stroke Risk Factor ValueSet
Descriptino: Defines the SNOMED CT codes for conditions or risk factors relevant to stroke.

Name: StrokeRiskFactorValueSet
Title: Stroke Risk Factor ValueSet
Descriptino: Defines the SNOMED CT codes for conditions or risk factors relevant to stroke, including an option for unknown status.

Name: SwallowProceduresValueset
Title: Swallow Procedures ValueSet
Descriptino: ValueSet containing SNOMED CT codes representing a range of procedures used in the evaluation and management of stroke patients.

Name: SwallowingScreeningTimingCategoryVS
Title: Swallowing Screening Timing Category ValueSet
Descriptino: Temporal categories relative to stroke onset for swallowing screening.

Name: ThrombectomyComplicationVS
Title: Thrombectomy Complication ValueSet
Descriptino: Defines the specific complications of thrombectomy to record.

Name: TimingMetricCodesVS
Title: Stroke Timing Metric Codes ValueSet
Descriptino: ValueSet for key process timing metrics in acute stroke care (D2N, D2G).

Name: VitalSignCodesVS
Title: Stroke Vital Sign Codes ValueSet
Descriptino: Codes for key vital signs relevant to stroke assessment (Systolic, Diastolic BP).

Name: GenderSNOMEDVS
Title: Gender (SNOMED CT)
Descriptino: Value set to represent patient gender using SNOMED CT codes, analogous to AdministrativeGender.
